import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './PlaceOrder.css'; import { StoreContext } from '../../context/StoreContext'; const PlaceOrder = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount, token, food_list, cartItems, url } = useContext(StoreContext); const [data, setData] = useState({ firstName:"", lastName:"", email:"", street:"", city:"", state:"", pincode:"", country:"", phone:"" }); onChangeHandler return (

Delivery Information

Cart Totals

Subtotal

Rs. {getTotalCartAmount()}

Delivery Charges

Rs.{getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:149}

Total Rs. {getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:getTotalCartAmount() + 149}
) } export default PlaceOrder
